entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've met with Bib Fortuna in Mos Eisley.
entries.journal_entry_description: Meet with Bib Fortuna in Mos Eisley.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: I am in an immediate need of someone I can trust. Since you and I have a history, I think you will do fine. Travel to Mos Eisley immediately and find Bib Fortuna. He'll fill you in. As usual you will be rewarded.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Bib Fortuna is awaiting your arrival at Mos Eisley on Tatooine.
